definition[0]: money belonging to someone that is controlled for them by a trustee
definition[1]: a fund for money or property held for the benefit of others or for a particular purpose. The person in charge of the fund is responsible for the money etc and can only act in certain ways
example[0]: A small percentage of the gasoline tax flows into a trust fund to clean up leaking underground storage tanks at filling stations
example[1]: the Yorkshire Minersâ€™ Welfare Trust Fund
